# A simple test that verifies the setup of goproxytest

vim ex 'e main.go'
vim ex 'w'
cmp go.mod go.mod.golden

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

go 1.12

require example.com/blah v1.0.0
-- go.mod.golden --
module mod.com

go 1.12

require example.com/blah v1.0.0
-- main.go --
package main

import "example.com/blah"

func main() {
	println(blah.Name)
}
